result.arabic_text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ
result.translation: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the people of the Elephant[1]?
result.footnotes: [1] The army of Abrahah al-Ashram was accompanied by a huge elephant who came with the intention of demolishing the Kaʿba.

result.translation: Did He not turn their scheme into a total loss[2]?
He sent against them swarms of birds,
pelting them with stones of baked clay,
